components.title: ByteSized Security Awareness Training
components.description: A custom-built interactive security awareness program using gamification and micro-learning to reduce human risk. Modules cover foundational security hygiene, phishing and social engineering defense, and cultivate a security-first culture.
components.purpose: Reduce organizational human risk through engaging, measurable security awareness training that exceeds traditional compliance-driven approaches.

implemented-requirements.description: Literacy Training and Awareness — ByteSized provides role-based security awareness training through interactive modules covering password hygiene, physical security, social engineering, and incident reporting. Engagement rates exceed 100% of baseline through gamification.
Role-Based Training — Modules are designed with progressive complexity, allowing tailored delivery based on job function and risk exposure level.
Training Records — Module engagement metrics (completion rates, time-on-task, gamification scores) provide auditable evidence of training delivery and effectiveness.

Information Security Awareness, Education and Training — ByteSized delivers awareness training that is contextual, engaging, and measurable, supporting continuous improvement of the organization's security posture.

components.title: Remote Work Security Policy Framework
components.description: A comprehensive remote work policy framework addressing endpoint security, BYOD environments, and secure access requirements for distributed workforces.
components.purpose: Establish governance controls for remote work scenarios that balance security requirements with operational flexibility.

implemented-requirements.description: Remote Access — Policy defines acceptable remote access methods, authentication requirements, and monitoring obligations for remote workers.
Access Control for Mobile Devices — BYOD provisions establish minimum security standards for personal devices accessing organizational resources.
Remote Working — Policy framework provides controls and guidelines for securing information accessed, processed, or stored at remote working sites.

components.title: Phishing Campaign Analysis & Simulation Program
components.description: A structured phishing simulation program that designs, executes, and analyzes simulated phishing campaigns to measure and reduce organizational susceptibility to social engineering attacks.
components.purpose: Quantifiably reduce phishing click rates through iterative simulation campaigns and targeted follow-up training.

implemented-requirements.description: Social Engineering and Mining — Phishing simulations provide practical exercises that train personnel to recognize and report social engineering attempts, with measurable 15% reduction in click rates over two quarters.
Penetration Testing — Simulated phishing campaigns serve as a form of social engineering penetration testing, identifying human-layer vulnerabilities.
